oneOf.title: rotate
oneOf.description: Rotate the image by 180 degrees. Used when the camera is installed upside down.

oneOf.title: depth_to_pretty
oneOf.description: Turns a depth image source into a colorful image, with blue indicating distant points and red indicating nearby points.

oneOf.title: overlay
oneOf.description: Projects a point cloud to a 2D RGB and Depth image, and overlays the two images. Used to debug the RGB+D alignment.

oneOf.title: depth_edges
oneOf.description: Applies a Canny edge detector to find edges. Only works on cameras that produce depth maps.

oneOf.title: identity
oneOf.description: Does nothing to the image. Can use this to duplicate camera sources, or change the source's stream or parameters.

oneOf.title: resize
oneOf.description: Resizes the image to the specified height and width

oneOf.title: crop
oneOf.description: Crop the image to the specified rectangle in pixels

oneOf.title: undistort
oneOf.description: Uses intrinsics and modified Brown-Conrady parameters to undistort the source image.

oneOf.title: detections
oneOf.description: Overlays object detections on the image. Can use any detector registered in the vision service.

oneOf.title: classifications
oneOf.description: Overlays image classifications on the image. Can use any classifier registered in the vision service.

oneOf.title: segmentations
oneOf.description: Segments the camera's point cloud. Can use any segmenter registered in the vision service.

oneOf.title: depth_preprocess
oneOf.description: Applies some basic hole-filling and edge smoothing to a depth map.
